word: If we give ourselves to the One who gave His life for us, He will take us into relationship with Himself as His children. His life will be our life. "Come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you, and will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be My sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty" [2 Corinthians 6:17, 18].
